channel.title: Setup on Aggregator
channel.description: Recent content in Setup on Aggregator

item.description: Production Configuration and Administration # Control performance and costs # You can specify the size for the Virtual machine running the rules using the hostingPlanSku and hostingPlanTier options. The defaults are Y1/Dynamic, known as Consumption plan. You can select a Premium plan instead, like Premium/P2V2 for example. Production monitoring # Disable built-in logging and use Application Insights. Build-in log streaming is useful only for developers as it may skip or duplicate messages as in this picture.
